channel.description:
I can´t configure the 16:9 screen size... I don´t know what´s the problem, I run Black Mesa in Steam and it works but when I change from 4:3 to 16:9 it doesn´t apply changes (even if I press Apply).
Could someone help me?
regards

item.dc:creator: MaxTheLimit
item.description:
What is your GPU?
What scaling settings do you have set up in your GPU control centre?

item.dc:creator: Ronnyman
item.description:
PlausibleSarge:

add -w and -h to the games launch options, with suitable values

for example, I would use

-w 1920 -h 1080

because I play at 1920x1080 resolution

to edit launch options, right click the game in steam and select properties, there should be a big button labelled “set launch options”

I tried, it doesn’t help! It just makes the screen bigger inside the two black bars…
